name: nw_advertise_descriptor_t
desc: A description used to advertise the Bonjour service that a listener provides.

items.name: func nw_advertise_descriptor_create_bonjour_service(UnsafePointer<CChar>?, UnsafePointer<CChar>, UnsafePointer<CChar>?) -> nw_advertise_descriptor_t?
items.desc: Initializes a Bonjour service to advertise.

items.name: func nw_advertise_descriptor_set_no_auto_rename(nw_advertise_descriptor_t, Bool)
items.desc: Sets a Boolean to indicate whether the service prohibits automatic renaming in the event of a name conflict.

items.name: func nw_advertise_descriptor_get_no_auto_rename(nw_advertise_descriptor_t) -> Bool
items.desc: Checks whether the service prohibits automatic renaming in the event of a name conflict.

items.name: func nw_advertise_descriptor_set_txt_record(nw_advertise_descriptor_t, UnsafeRawPointer?, Int)
items.desc: Sets the TXT record as a raw buffer to advertise with the service.

items.name: func nw_advertise_descriptor_set_txt_record_object(nw_advertise_descriptor_t, nw_txt_record_t?)
items.desc: Sets the TXT record to advertise with the service.

items.name: func nw_advertise_descriptor_copy_txt_record_object(nw_advertise_descriptor_t) -> nw_txt_record_t?
items.desc: Accesses the TXT record to advertise with the service.
